data.name: Exodus Idle
data.detailed_description:
Set in a decaying fantasy universe, follow Renard, Lysa and Amyline as they travel deeper into the mysterious world of their ancestors, pursued by a mysterious and unrelenting force. Exodus Idle is an idle game in which you can:

  • Loot and upgrade equipment
  • Hunt creatures to acquire resources
  • Fight strategic monster battles, where learning the enemy's attack patterns is key
  • Manage resource collection with tradeskills
  • Construct buildings to increase your global abilities
  • Spend resources to grow stronger
  • Progress both offline and actively
  • Unlock achievements
  • Read the built-in novelisation (yes, seriously - targeting 50,000+ words!)

Join the Discord for updates and discussions: https://discord.gg/QQTJW9hxMX

data.short_description: Exodus Idle is an idle game in which you fight monsters, hunt, construct buildings, loot and upgrade equipment. As you progress, follow along with the built-in novelisation and journey into the dark world beyond The Sereid.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 and above
  • Processor: 64 bit
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 400 or Better
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
  • Sound Card: n/a
  • Additional Notes: Very low overheads - should work on 'most' computers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 and above
  • Processor: 64 bit
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
